All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Alert
This class provides convenient methods for displaying various messages and interacting with the user in the console interface.
CheckFileController
 
Cnsl
This class facilitates console input and handles possible read errors.
DeleteNoteController
The class responsible for deleting a note.
EditNoteMenuAlerts
Helper class for EditNoteMenuView.java Printing note content, and accepts, check and return user commands.
EditNoteMenuView
Provides tools for editing a note.
MainMenuAlerts
Helper class for MainMenuView.java Displays a list of notes, and accepts and processes user commands.
MainMenuConditionController
This class is responsible for managing pagination and the state of the application's main menu, ensuring that values are updated and checking if you can navigate through the pages.
MainMenuView
The main menu of the program, which shows you all the notes and will provide navigation.
NewNoteMenuView
Provides an interface for creating a new note.
Note
The class representing a note contains information about the note file, but don't contain information about the file itself.
NoteContentMove
A class that provides methods for editing a note.
NoteController
A class for interacting with instances of the Note.java class.
NoteListController
A class to manage a list of notes and files to store the list of notes.
NoteMenuAlerts
Helper class for NoteMenuView.java Displays note content, accepts, processes, validate and returns user commands.
NoteMenuView
A user interface for viewing and interacting with the selected note.
SaveNoteController
This class ensures that notes are saved and the note list is updated by adding information about the new note to the note list file and saving the note title in the corresponding file.
Start
Start program.
